infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Naturinex Wellness Guide uses the camera to capture text from product labels for educational wellness information lookup
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Naturinex Wellness Guide accesses photos to analyze product labels and provide educational wellness information
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Naturinex Wellness Guide can save educational wellness information to your photo library for future reference
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Naturinex needs access to read your health data to provide personalized wellness insights and track your health metrics
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Naturinex can save wellness data to your Health app to help you track your health progress
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Naturinex uses Bluetooth to connect with health monitoring devices for real-time health tracking
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Naturinex uses your location to find nearby pharmacies and health services
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: Naturinex tracks your physical activity to provide personalized wellness recommendations

plugins.cameraPermission: Naturinex Wellness Guide uses the camera to capture product labels for educational wellness information

plugins.photosPermission: Naturinex needs access to your photos to analyze medication images
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Naturinex needs permission to save analysis results to your photos

plugins.faceIDPermission: Allow Naturinex to use Face ID for secure access to your health data
